snippet.title: All Quiet in the Trenches - About the game
snippet.description:
Some insights into how our game All Quiet in the Trenches works. It is a narrative turn-based strategy game set in World War 1.

Get to know your soldiers, take care of their needs and lead them in battle, trying to strike a precarious balance between the ambitions of your superiors and the survival of your men.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/863500/?utm_source=youtube

Visit us on
Discord: https://discord.gg/JuKgGQh
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@totally_not_aliens
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/totallynotaliens
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/totallynotaliens.de
Homepage: https://www.allquietinthetrenches.com

Music by Valentin Spiegel: https://www.valentinspiegel.de
